original: aindra n'i la'i 'od mnga' zhing //

analyzed: skad cig lha yi rnal 'byor gnas //

original: 'khor lo chen po spyan drangs nas //
analyzed: 'khor lo chen po spyan drangs nas //

analyzed: rnam dag dgu yi tshogs bsags bya //

original: byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms //
analyzed: byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms //

original: tshangs pa'i rgyun dang ldan pa yi //

original: stong pa chen po bsgom par bya //
analyzed: stong pa chen po bsgom par bya //

original: bdud kyi phyogs rnams 'jig byed phyir //
analyzed: bdud kyi phyogs rnams 'jig byed phyir //

original: chu skyes nyi ma'i steng nyid du //
analyzed: chu skyes nyi ma'i steng nyid du //

original: ya las rdo rje tho ba ni //
analyzed: ya las rdo rje tho ba ni //

original: rtse mo nyi shur ldan pa yi //
analyzed: rtse mo nyi shur ldan pa yi //

original: lte bar sa bon rab bzhag nas //
analyzed: lte bar sa bon rab bzhag nas //
translated: having placed the seed syllable in the center,

original: spro bsdu byas nas nga rgyal bsam //
analyzed: spro bsdu byas nas nga rgyal bsam //

original: aom sarba buddha badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /

original: sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po //
analyzed: sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po //

original: stag gi pags pa sham thabs su //
analyzed: stag gi pags pa sham thabs su //

original: mnabs shing g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang ba //
analyzed: mnabs shing g-yas bskum g-yon brkyang ba //

original: klu dang dur khrod 'khrugs pas brgyan //
analyzed: klu dang dur khrod 'khrugs pas brgyan //

analyzed: mche gtsigs spyan dgur 'jigs pa'i mdangs //

original: me dpung dkyil du gnas pa bsgom //
analyzed: me dpung dkyil du gnas pa bsgom //
translated: meditate on him dwelling in the midst of a bonfire.üîΩThe body, speech, mind, and six sense bases

original: sku gsung thugs dang skye mched @75b drug / rdo rje gsal bar bskyed par bya //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs dang skye mched @75b drug / rdo rje gsal bar bskyed par bya //

analyzed: dbang rtags gshin rje gshed kyis brgyan //

original: yig 'bru bzhi yis dgug gzhug bya //
analyzed: yig 'bru bzhi yis dgug gzhug bya //

original: bu ga chen po spros pas mchod //
analyzed: bu ga chen po spros pas mchod //

original: rdo rje dril bu ldan pas bstod //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu ldan pas bstod //

original: h'um h'um rdo rje stobs po che //
analyzed: h'um h'um rdo rje stobs po che //

original: rab 'jigs mi mthun zad mdzad pa //
analyzed: rab 'jigs mi mthun zad mdzad pa //

original: rdo rje sku dbyer med pa'i lha ;
analyzed: rdo rje sku dbyer med pa'i lha ;

analyzed: / tho ba rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod // sgron ma 'o mar ldan pa yis //

original: kha yi bu ga dag par bsam //
analyzed: kha yi bu ga dag par bsam //

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs bskul bas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs bskul bas //

original: 'gro ba ma lus sbyang bar bya //
analyzed: 'gro ba ma lus sbyang bar bya //

original: sngags kyi rgyal po rjes dran pas //
analyzed: sngags kyi rgyal po rjes dran pas //

original: khri dang 'bum du bzlas par bya //
analyzed: khri dang 'bum du bzlas par bya //

original: aom gung+ga ra dhrik h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom gung+ga ra dhrik h'um h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /

original: phyag rgya bkrol nas ngal bso ba //
analyzed: phyag rgya bkrol nas ngal bso ba //

original: gcig dang du ma las grol ba //
analyzed: gcig dang du ma las grol ba //

original: rang bzhin med pa'i snying po can //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa'i snying po can //

original: chos kun gyi ni bdag po can //
analyzed: chos kun gyi ni bdag po can //

original: rnyed pa'i drin 'di thob pa des //
analyzed: rnyed pa'i drin 'di thob pa des //

original: bskul nas sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //
analyzed: bskul nas sgrub thabs 'di byas pas //

original: thams cad 'bras bu mngon rnyed shog / khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyis grub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: thams cad 'bras bu mngon rnyed shog / khro bo tho ba gshin rje gshed kyis grub thabs zhes bya ba /
